sora_prompt.scene_description: Interior mall atrium. Fluorescent lights begin to hum and pulse in unison. The fountain's water slows, then reverses direction for a moment. Security camera feeds on nearby monitors all freeze on the same timestamp. A child's balloon floats upward, but stops mid-air, perfectly still. The muzak skips, repeats the same three notes. Everything holds for five seconds. Then resumes. Camera is fixed, wide shot, no movement. Only the wrongness moves.
sora_prompt.style: Surveillance footage aesthetic, slight VHS distortion, timestamp visible, institutional fluorescent lighting, uncanny valley
